user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we want to learn some interesting facts along the way. Can you give us a random Chuck Norris joke and a random trivia fact about a number? Also, recommend some popular landmarks to visit on our trip.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random Chuck Norris joke to entertain the friends during the road trip.
Fetch a random trivia fact about a number to provide interesting knowledge during the trip.
Recommend popular landmarks to visit along the road trip route.
